attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel is a not a luxury, it is an essential factor of all our lives.Abolish VAT which straight away knocks 17.5% off our bills & get some voters back on your side. We pay so much duty on fuel , why tax us again?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
